item.title: "PyMyFlySpy: track your flight using its headrest data" by Robert Heaton
item.description: The thrilling sequel to PySkyWiFi! 1641 words. Link to story.

item.title: "5 Months to Run Code Locally" by Nathan Spencer
item.description: A Kafkaesque tale of corporate security/risk bureaucracy, aka a very accurate description of what it's like to work as a software developer at a large financial institution. (Can you tell I relate to this one?) 1555 words. Link to story.

item.title: "The case of the 500-mile email" by Trey Harris
item.description: In which emails suddenly refuse to travel more than ~500 miles. 995 words. Link to story.

item.title: "The secret inside One Million Checkboxes" by Nolen Royalty
item.description: In which some teens use checkboxes to draw pictures. 2268 words. Link to story.

item.title: "When you browse Instagram and find former Australian Prime Minister Tony Abbott's passport number" by mangopdf (Alex Hope)
item.description: A very funny cautionary tale about not posting your boarding pass online. 8740 words. Link to story.

item.title: "PySkyWiFi: completely free, unbelievably stupid wi-fi on long-haul flights" by Robert Heaton
item.description: A brilliantly ridiculous concept: squeezing the entire internet through the name field of an airmiles account. 4360 words. Link to story.

item.title: "The Wi-Fi only works when it's raining" by Predrag
item.description: An investigation into a mysterious Wi-Fi glitch. 1817 words. Link to story.
